metadata.title: CVE-2021-20286 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in libnbd 1.7.3. An assertion failure in nbd_unlocked_opt_go in ilb/opt.c may lead to denial of service.

criterions.comment: libnbd package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.2-1').
